name: michigander
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone from the US state of Michigan: Osmond is a lifelong Michigander who has worked in the auto industry for 37 years. Improving the state's public health infrastructure will have long-lasting, positive effects on the health of Michiganians.
More examplesFewer examplesVirtually every Michigander with land has invasive plants.Any Michigander can vote in the primary, regardless of party affiliation.Many young Michiganians do not even know Detroit had an Avenue of Fashion.
